meanings.definition: The practice of breeding and raising fish for commercial purposes.
meanings.sent1: Piscicultures require careful monitoring of water quality and feeding schedules.
meanings.sent2: The local piscicultures supply fresh fish to restaurants in the area.
meanings.sent3: The fish in the piscicultures must be the happiest in the sea!
meanings.sent4: Her backyard pond became a bustling pisciculture, teeming with life.
meanings.sent5: The success of the piscicultures depended on the expertise of the fish farmers.

meanings.definition: The facilities or operations involved in fish farming.
meanings.sent1: The new pisciculture was equipped with state-of-the-art tanks and filtration systems.
meanings.sent2: Visitors were amazed by the size of the piscicultures and the variety of fish.
meanings.sent3: The piscicultures were so efficient that even the fish were impressed!
meanings.sent4: The pisciculture hummed with activity as workers tended to the fish.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the piscicultures wafted through the air, enticing passersby.
